Package parser

Class Page

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.text.html.HTMLEditorKit.ParserCallback
parser.Page
All Implemented Interfaces:
Actions
public class Page
extends javax.swing.text.html.HTMLEditorKit.ParserCallback
implements Actions
Represents a page with properties: pageUrl and timeout - and allows to read its content and count number of words on the page.
